name: CRYPTEX
description:
The main character named Ozgur finds himself in an almost impossible and difficult mission as a result of Dalyan captured his best friend. Dalyan is one of the leading mafia of Istanbul, he has a cryptex with confidential information in it and does not have the necessary passwords to open this cryptex. Ozgur must find the cryptex's passwords to save his friend.

In this action-packed interactive movie, you will experience the beautiful atmosphere of Istanbul and you will be the leading role in this movie thanks to POV shooting. You will walk on the edge of death and sometimes you will have to kill to live.

According to the choices you will make, this game will drag you to one of 6 different final scenes. You will experience the results of your choices from the beginning to the end. You will have a limited time to make your decisions.

You should watch carefully this game which has a cinematic interactive structure, and make the right choices. Otherwise, death will never let you go :)
